#summary Development Road Map for BigBlueButton

= Release 0.64 =
We are currently working on BigBlueButton 0.64.  This release will focus on stability and bug fixes, along with the following new features:
   * Mute/unmute controls for the voice conference
   * Speed improvements to desktop sharing
   * [API API enhancements]

See [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list?can=2&q=milestone=Release0.64 for all issues tagged for 0.64 release].  Also see [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/browse_thread/thread/dc3c08f9fa29dad7# Minutes from the BigBlueButton 0.64 developer's meeting].

You can follow the progress of this release by subscribing to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/topics?gvc=2 developers mailing list].

== Previous Releases ==
To see the progress in previous iterations, see [ReleaseNotes BigBlueButton Release Notes].
